snippet.title: Observation of the resonant character of the $Z(4430)^-$ state
snippet.description: Observation of the resonant character of the $Z(4430)^-$ state / LHCb collaboration Resonant structures in $B^0\to\psi'\pi^-K^+$ decays are analyzed by performing a four-dimensional fit of the decay amplitude, using $pp$ collision data corresponding to $\rm 3 fb^{-1}$ collected with the LHCb detector. [...] arXiv:1404.1903 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-014 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-061. \- 2014\. - 10 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s) \- Related supplementary data file(s)

snippet.title: Evidence for the decay $B_c^+ \rightarrow J/\psi 3\pi^+ 2\pi^-$
snippet.description: Evidence for the decay $B_c^+ \rightarrow J/\psi 3\pi^+ 2\pi^-$ / LHCb collaboration Evidence is presented for the decay $B_c+\rightarrow J/\psi 3\pi^+2\pi^-$ using proton-proton collision data, corresponding to an integrated luminosity of 3fb$^{-1}$, collected with the LHCb detector. [...] arXiv:1404.0287 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-054 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-009. \- 2014\. - 12 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s)

snippet.title: Evidence for the decay $X(3872)\rightarrow\psi(2S)\gamma$
snippet.description: Evidence for the decay $X(3872)\rightarrow\psi(2S)\gamma$ / LHCb collaboration Evidence for the decay mode $X(3872)\rightarrow\psi(2S)\gamma$ in $B^+\rightarrow X(3872)K^+$ decays is found with a significance of 4.4 standard deviations. [...] arXiv:1404.0275 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-050 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-008. \- 2014\. - 19 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s)

snippet.title: Angular analysis of charged and neutral $B \to K \mu^+\mu^-$ decays
snippet.description: Angular analysis of charged and neutral $B \to K \mu^+\mu^-$ decays / LHCb collaboration The angular distributions of the rare decays $B^+ \to K^+\mu^+\mu^-$ and $B^0 \to K^0_{\rm\scriptscriptstyle S}\mu^+\mu^-$ are studied with data corresponding to 3$~$fb$^{-1}$ of integrated luminosity, collected in proton-proton collisions at 7 and 8$~$TeV centre-of-mass energies with the LHCb detector. [...] arXiv:1403.8045 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-007 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-056. \- 2014\. - 27 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s) \- Related supplementary data file(s)

snippet.title: Differential branching fractions and isospin asymmetries of $B \to K^{(*)}\mu^+\mu^+$ decays
snippet.description: Differential branching fractions and isospin asymmetries of $B \to K^{(*)}\mu^+\mu^+$ decays / LHCb collaboration The isospin asymmetries of $B \to K\mu^+\mu^-$ and $B \to K^{*}\mu^+\mu^-$ decays and the partial branching fractions of the $B^0 \to K^0\mu^+\mu^-$, $B^+ \to K^+\mu^+\mu^-$ and $B^+ \to K^{*+}\mu^+\mu^-$ decays are measured as functions of the dimuon mass squared, $q^2$. [...] arXiv:1403.8044 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-006 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-055. \- 2014\. - 23 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s) \- Related supplementary data file(s)

snippet.title: Study of beauty hadron decays into pairs of charm hadrons
snippet.description: Study of beauty hadron decays into pairs of charm hadrons / LHCb collaboration First observations of the decays $\Lambda_b^0 \to \Lambda_c^+ D_{(s)}^-$ are reported using data corresponding to an integrated luminosity of $3\,{\rm fb}^{-1}$ collected at 7 and 8 TeV center-of-mass energy in proton-proton collisions with the LHCb detector. [...] arXiv:1403.3606 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-033 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-002. \- 2014\. - 17 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s)

snippet.title: Measurement of polarization amplitudes and $CP$ asymmetries in $B^0 \to \phi K^*(892)^0$
snippet.description: Measurement of polarization amplitudes and $CP$ asymmetries in $B^0 \to \phi K^*(892)^0$ / LHCb collaboration An angular analysis of the decay $B^0 \to \phi K^*(892)^0$ is reported based on a $pp$ collision data sample, corresponding to an integrated luminosity of 1.0 fb$^{-1}$, collected at a centre-of-mass energy of $\sqrt{s} = 7$ TeV with the LHCb detector. [...] arXiv:1403.2888 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-038 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-005. \- 2014\. - 26 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s) \- Related supplementary data file(s)

snippet.title: Measurement of $\psi(2S)$ polarisation in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
snippet.description: Measurement of $\psi(2S)$ polarisation in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV / LHCb collaboration The polarisation of prompt $\psi(2S)$ mesons is measured by performing an angular analysis of $\psi(2S)\rightarrow \mu^{+} \mu^{-}$ decays using proton-proton collision data, corresponding to an integrated luminosity of 1.0 fb$^{-1}$, collected by the LHCb detector at a centre-of-mass energy of 7 TeV. [...] arXiv:1403.1339 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-029 ; LHCB-PAPER-2013-067. \- 2014\. - 22 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s)

snippet.title: Observation of photon polarization in the $b \to s\gamma$ transition
snippet.description: Observation of photon polarization in the $b \to s\gamma$ transition / LHCb collaboration This Letter presents a study of the flavor-changing neutral current radiative $B^{\pm} \to K^{\pm}\pi^{\mp}\pi^{\pm}\gamma$ decays performed using data collected in proton-proton collisions with the LHCb detector at $7$ and $8\,$TeV center-of-mass energies. [...] arXiv:1402.6852 ; CERN-PH-EP-2014-026 ; LHCB-PAPER-2014-001. \- 2014\. - 17 p. Preprint \- Related data file(s) \- Related supplementary data file(s)

snippet.title: Airships: A New Horizon for Science
snippet.description: Airships: A New Horizon for Science / Miller, Sarah H (UCI) ; Fesen, Robert (Dartmouth) ; Hillenbrand, Lynne (Caltech) ; Rhodes, Jason (NASA JPL) ; Baird, Gil (ILC Dover) ; Blake, Geoffrey (Caltech) ; Booth, Jeff (JPL) ; Carlile, David E (Lockheed Martin ADP) ; Duren, Riley (JPL) ; Edworthy, Frederick G (Aeros) et al. The "Airships: A New Horizon for Science" study at the Keck Institute for Space Studies investigated the potential of a variety of airships currently operable or under development to serve as observatories and science instrumentation platforms for a range of space, atmospheric, and Earth science. [...] arXiv:1402.6706 ; URS241593 APPROVED FOR UNLIMITED RELEASE BY NASA JPL WITH CLEARANCE NUMBER CL#14-0894. \- 2014\. Preprint
